Ruitai Zhengzhong Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Fenxi Ruitai Zhengzhong Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Fenxi Ruitai Zhengzhong Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Shanxi Coking Coal Group.
